languages.text: "Леди Теодора! Позвольте, разве я дал вам плохой ответ? Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g} — то, что оберегает Человечество, и то, чему неукоснительно следует подчиняться каждому из нас. {name} не способ{mf|ен|на} даже запомнить простое правило, тогда как я..."

traits.locale_text: "Леди Теодора! Позвольте, разве я дал вам плохой ответ? Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g} — то, что оберегает Человечество, и то, чему неукоснительно следует подчиняться каждому из нас. {name} не способ{mf|ен|на} даже запомнить простые правило, тогда как я..."

languages.text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора! Позвольте, разве я дал вам плохой ответ? Заветы {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g} — то, что оберегает Человечество, и то, чему неукоснительно следует подчиняться каждому из нас. {name} не способ{mf|ен|на} даже запомнить простое правило, тогда как я..."

traits.locale_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

"But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

"But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

"But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

"But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

languages.text: “可西奥多拉夫人！拜托，我的答案真的无法令您满意吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的信条保护着所有人类。因此，我们每个人都必须不折不扣地遵守祂的教诲。{name}甚至没有能力记住这个简单的准则，而我——”
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

traits.locale_text: “可西奥多拉夫人！拜托，我的答案真的无法令您满意吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的信条保护着所有人类。因此，我们每个人都必须不折不扣地遵守祂的教诲。{name}甚至没有能力记住这个简单的准则，而我——”

languages.text: «¡Pero lady Theodora! Dígame, ¿acaso le desagrada mi respuesta en algo? El dogma del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} es lo que nos protege a todos y cada uno, y por eso debemos obedecerlo sin rechistar. {name} es incapaz de recordar algo tan sencillo, mientras que yo...».
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Pero lady Theodora! Dígame, ¿acaso le desagrada mi respuesta en algo? El dogma del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} es lo que nos protege a todos y cada uno, y por eso debemos obedecerlo sin rechistar. {name} es incapaz de recordar algo tan sencillo, mientras que yo...».

languages.text: 「しかし、シオドーラ様！教えてください。私の答えは満足のいくものでは、ありませんでしたか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は人類を守るものであり、我々一人一人が必ず従わなければならないものです。{name}さんはその簡単な規則さえ覚えることができませんが、その一方で私は…」
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、レディ・テオドラ！お祈りください。私の答えは満足のいくものでは、ありませんでしたか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は人類を守るものであり、我々一人一人が必ず従わなければならないものです。{name}はその簡単な規則さえ思い出すことができませんが、その一方で私は…」
「しかし、シオドーラ様！教えてください。私の答えは満足のいくものでは、ありませんでしたか？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の教義は人類を守るものであり、我々一人一人が必ず従わなければならないものです。{name}さんはその簡単な規則さえ覚えることができませんが、その一方で私は…」

languages.text: « Mais, dame Théodora ! Ma réponse n'était-elle pas satisfaisante d'une certaine manière ? Les principes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} protègent l'humanité et chacun de nous se doit de les observer sans faillir. {name} est incapable de suivre ce simple précepte, alors que je... »
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

traits.locale_text: « Mais, dame Théodora ! Ma réponse n'était-elle pas satisfaisante d'une certaine manière ? Les principes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} protègent l'humanité et chacun de nous se doit de les observer sans faillir. {name} est incapable de suivre ce simple précepte, alors que je... »

languages.text: "Aber Lady Theodora! War meine Antwort denn in irgendeiner Weise nicht zufriedenstellend? Die Dogmen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} schützen die Menschheit, und wir alle müssen sie uneingeschränkt befolgen. {name} kann sich nicht einmal diese simple Regel merken, wohingegen ich ..."
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

traits.locale_text: "Aber Lady Theodora! War meine Antwort denn in irgendeiner Weise nicht zufriedenstellend? Die Dogmen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} schützen die Menschheit, und wir alle müssen sie uneingeschränkt befolgen. {name} kann sich nicht einmal diese simple Regel merken, wohingegen ich ..."

languages.text: "Ama Leydi Theodora! Lütfen söyleyin, cevabım hiç mi tatmin edici değildi? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} ilkeleri İnsanlığı korur ve her birimizin onlara kayıtsız şartsız itaat etmesi gerekir. {name} bu basit kuralı hatırlamaktan bile âcizken, bendeniz..."
languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail. {name} is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"

languages.original_text: "But, Lady Theodora! Pray, was my answer unsatisfactory in some way? The God-Emperor's tenets are what protects Humanity and what each and every one of us must obey without fail.  is incapable even of remembering that simple rule, while I—"
